attributes.action: Fine drivers that DON'T have any lights on when it's foggy or in heavy rain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed more drivers that for some reason don't bother to switch any lights on their cars when it's foggy in heavy rain. It may not improve your own vision, but will enable be seen by other drivers. Especially when most of the cars on the road are silver which become less visible than other colours in poor visability
